content: this tiny little bat depending on the yarn you use will end up about 2 tall with a wingspan of about 5 the feet are actually small loops so your bat can hang upside down from a small stick or length of yarn or cord you will need small amount of black purple or light and dark brown yarn double knitting or worsted weight 1 pair of 7 5mm brown safety eyes or 6mm black safety eyes or yarn to embroider them small amount of stuffing 3 5mm e hook tapestry needle
